scripts.name: Basic ADC (Analog-to-Digital Converter) operations
scripts.description: This example shows how to read analog voltages.

scripts.name: Async Read
scripts.description: Demo of using select.poll() to check for input on stdin without blocking.

scripts.name: Clickwheel Menu
scripts.description: Menu navigation with clickwheel: turn to select, press to choose, double-click to exit.

scripts.name: Basic DAC (Digital-to-Analog Converter) operations
scripts.description: This example shows how to set DAC voltages.

scripts.name: Basic GPIO (General Purpose Input/Output) operations
scripts.description: This example shows digital I/O, direction control, and pull resistors.

scripts.name: Interactive Demo - Control connections with probe, encoder, and buttons
scripts.description: This example shows how to use all the interactive controls together.

scripts.name: LED Brightness Control Demo
scripts.description: Touch breadboard pads 1-60 to control LED brightness levels.

scripts.name: Lipo Char
scripts.description: LiPo Cell Characterizer for Jumperless V5

scripts.name: Node connection and routing operations
scripts.description: This example shows how to connect/disconnect nodes and check connections.

scripts.name: Oled Copy Print
scripts.description: Debug output to OLED: print() appears on both serial and OLED.

scripts.name: Oled Framebuffer Save Restore
scripts.description: Capture OLED to file, clear display, then restore from file.

scripts.name: Oled Pixel Graphics
scripts.description: Draw a diagonal line and a box using oled_set_pixel.

scripts.name: Oled Screen Capture
scripts.description: Capture OLED framebuffer, invert pixels, display, then restore original.

scripts.name: Jumperless Oscilloscope Demo
scripts.description: Controls:

scripts.name: Overlay Probe Move
scripts.description: Move a graphic overlay by touching breadboard pads with the probe.

scripts.name: Probe Button Net Color
scripts.description: Probe button: hold Connect/Remove to change net 0 hue. Stop with Ctrl+C.

scripts.name: Probe Switch Demo
scripts.description: Respond to probe switch: Measure mode shows ADC voltage; Select mode shows touched pad.

scripts.name: Probe Touch Demo
scripts.description: Wait for probe touch, then wait for probe button. Uses global API (no j. prefix).

scripts.name: PSRAM Test Script for Jumperless v5
scripts.description: This script tests whether external PSRAM is available and working.

scripts.name: Simple FakeGPIO Node-Based API Test
scripts.description: Quick test to verify the new node-based FakeGPIO API works correctly.

scripts.name: Jumperless Stylophone
scripts.description: Musical instrument using probe and GPIO to generate audio tones.

scripts.name: Interactive NeoPixel Demo
scripts.description: This also shows how you can grab modules

scripts.name: Test script for new OLED MicroPython features
scripts.description: Run this on the Jumperless device to test all new OLED functions

scripts.name: Basic UART operations
scripts.description: This example shows how to use UART.

scripts.name: Voltage Monitor Demo
scripts.description: Monitor voltage on ADC with real-time OLED display.
